name: TalentRooster
tag_list: video-resumes, human-resources, hr, digital-video-technology, social-media, video-resume, hiring-trends, resumes, recruiting-trends, job-search, video, cv, social-networking, video-interview, personal-branding, creative-job-hunting, search-staffing-indust
overview:
TalentRooster is the leading video interview service. Video technology is powerful and will save both time and money. Viewing a profile will provide you 80% of the information you need, before ever meeting the candidate! General Information A complete video interview service in a box for your company. Nothing could be easier. We’ve thought through everything you need to get started right away.

Here’s what’s included:

Private/secure candidate database for company’s candidates Personal interactive training for users Access to videos via any web browser or mobile device Company branded registration page and candidate profiles Customized questions for candidates to answer on video Ability to add written questions/answers in addition to video Digital profiles with video, education, work experience, skills, achievements, etc. Personality test for all candidates Customized checklist for candidates (tests passed, reviewer signoff, etc.) Ability to tag candidates as hired, rejected, or hold
